import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { useLanguage } from '../../context/LanguageContext'; import './ModernHero.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const ModernHero = () => { const { t } = useLanguage(); return (
{t('premiumAutoCare')}

{t('heroTitle')}

{t('heroSubtitle')}

100% {t('happyClients')}
3+ {t('yearsExperience')}
100% {t('satisfactionRate')}
â˜…

{t('trustedService')}

{t('topRatedService')}

{t('premiumDetailing')}
{t('ceramicCoating')}
); }; export default ModernHero;
